stories.text:
Hello,

We at Stacks have developed a New Mobile Application Drag and Drop Builder Called Brickit which is integrated with WooCommerce and WordPress through APIs.

We’re looking for beta testers who are willing to test our builder and give a full feedback including ( UI Testing, Functionality Testing, etc. )

This will be in exchange for a free annual subscription, so you can have a mobile application for your business or your client during that period.

If anyone is interested, I would like to know your field of work and your website to make sure that the people who will get the Free Subscription would benefit the most from our product.

I will onboard you on how to start once you send me.
stories.title: Looking for Beta Testers for Mobile Application Builder
